greyed_times: This area is greyed out because it's not part of the event. You may be looking at this event in a different timezone from where it was created.

nav.title: Click to copy
nav.shareinfo: Copy the link to this page, or share via <1>email</1>.
nav.shareinfo_alt: Click the link above to copy it to your clipboard, or share via <1>email</1>.
nav.email_body: Visit this link to enter your preferences:

form.signed_out: Sign in to add your preferences
form.name: Your name
form.info: These details are only for this event. Use a password to prevent others from changing your preferences.

errors.name_required: Your name is needed to store your preferences.
errors.password_incorrect: Password is incorrect. Check your name is spelled right.
errors.unknown: Failed to login. Please try again.

form.created_in_timezone: This event was created in the timezone {{timezone}}. <3>Click here to use it.
form.local_timezone: Your local timezone is detected to be {{timezone}}. <3>Click here to use it.

offline.title: You are offline
offline.body:
A Star Fit doesn't work offline.
Make sure you're connected to the internet and try again.

error.title: Event not found
error.body: Check that the url you entered is correct. Note that to protect your privacy, events are deleted after 3 months of inactivity.

group.info1: Hover or tap the calendar below to see preferences, and click to copy details about a time slot
group.info2: Click the names below to view people individually
group.best_fit3:
{{bestTime}} and {{nextBest}} scored the highest with {{bestStars}} and {{nextStars}}
Between these two finalists, {{bestVotesPeople}} preferred the best time, {{nextVotesPeople}} preferred the next best time, and {{noPrefPeople}} expressed no preference

you.info: Click and drag the calendar below to set your preferences. They are automatically saved.
you.scoring_info: The best time is calculated with <1>STAR Voting</1>. Give your preferred times five stars, your last choices zero stars, and score other times as desired.
you.tabulation_info: The two highest scoring times are finalists. Your full vote goes to the finalist you prefer.

recent.info: Importing will overwrite your current preferences

calendar.info: 1+ stars set free times to the score, 0 stars sets busy times to 0 stars
